RuleSet.Name: JavaJavaFxPomXml.xml

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaJavaJavaFxPomXml
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$javafx

RuleSet.GenFile:
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<parent> <groupId>$lower DefTopProjectName$</groupId> <artifactId>$lower DefTopProjectName$.$DefVUnderVersion$</artifactId> <version>$DefDotVersion$</version> </parent>
<groupId>$lower DefTopProjectName$.$DefVUnderVersion$</groupId> <artifactId>$lower DefTopProjectName$.$DefVUnderVersion$.$lower DefSubProjectName$.$lower SchemaName$javafx</artifactId> <version>$DefDotVersion$</version> <name>$lower DefTopProjectName$.$DefVUnderVersion$.$lower DefSubProjectName$.$lower SchemaName$javafx</name> <description>$TopProjectJustName$ $DefDotVersion$ $DefSubProjectName$ $lower SchemaName$javafx - JavaFX components for $SchemaName$ applications</description> <url>mailto:$AuthorEMail$</url>
<properties> <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding> <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source> <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target> <xerces.version>2.12.2</xerces.version> <junit-jupiter.version>6.0.1</junit-jupiter.version> <logback.version>1.5.22</logback.version> <commons-codec.version>1.20.0</commons-codec.version> <commons-text.version>1.15.0</commons-text.version> <jaxb-api.version>2.4.0-b180725.0427</jaxb-api.version> <jakarta-annotation-api.version>3.0.0</jakarta-annotation-api.version> <jakarta-persistence-api.version>3.2.0</jakarta-persistence-api.version> <postgresql.version>42.7.8</postgresql.version> <javafx.version>21.0.9</javafx.version> </properties>
<dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>server.markhome.mcf.v3_1</groupId> <artifactId>server.markhome.mcf.v3_1.cflib</artifactId> <version>3.1</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>server.markhome.mcf.v3_1</groupId> <artifactId>server.markhome.mcf.v3_1.cflib.dbutil</artifactId> <version>3.1</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>server.markhome.mcf.v3_1</groupId> <artifactId>server.markhome.mcf.v3_1.cflib.javafx</artifactId> <version>3.1</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>ch.qos.logback</groupId> <artifactId>logback-classic</artifactId> <version>$${logback.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>commons-codec</groupId> <artifactId>commons-codec</artifactId> <version>$${commons-codec.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId> <artifactId>junit-jupiter-api</artifactId> <version>$${junit-jupiter.version}</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId> <artifactId>junit-jupiter-engine</artifactId> <version>$${junit-jupiter.version}</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>javax.xml.bind</groupId> <artifactId>jaxb-api</artifactId> <version>$${jaxb-api.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId> <artifactId>commons-text</artifactId> <version>$${commons-text.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>jakarta.annotation</groupId> <artifactId>jakarta.annotation-api</artifactId> <version>$${jakarta-annotation-api.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-controls</artifactId> <version>$${javafx.version}</version> </dependency>$iterate SchemaRefs( each emitPomSchemaRefBaseDependency empty empty )$$emitPomSchemaRefBaseDependency$$iterate SchemaRefs( each emitPomSchemaRefBuffDependency empty empty )$$emitPomSchemaRefBuffDependency$$iterate SchemaRefs( each emitPomSchemaRefJavaFxDependency empty empty )$ </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>0.0.8</version> <configuration> <mainClass>YourClassNameHere</mainClass> </configuration> </plugin> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.5.3</version> <configuration> <useModulePath>false</useModulePath> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
<reporting> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.5.3</version><!--$$NO-MVN-MAN-VER$$--> <configuration> <skipTests>false</skipTests> <useSystemClassLoader>true</useSystemClassLoader> </configuration> </plugin> <plugin> <artifactId>maven-project-info-reports-plugin</artifactId> </plugin> </plugins> </reporting> </project>
